Protocols/Request.html#/s:6Siesta7Reques.name: onCompletion(_:)

Protocols/Request.html.name: Request
Protocols/Request.html.abstract: An API request. Provides notification hooks about the status of the request, and allows cancellation.

Enums/RequestState.html.name: RequestState
Enums/RequestState.html.abstract: Indicates whether a Request has been started, and whether it has completed.

Enums/Response.html.name: Response
Enums/Response.html.abstract: The outcome of a network request: either success (with an entity representing the resource’s current state), or

Enums/ResourceEvent/NewDataSource.html#/.name: network
Enums/ResourceEvent/NewDataSource.html#/.abstract: The new value of latestData comes from a successful network request.

Enums/ResourceEvent/NewDataSource.html#/.name: localOverride
Enums/ResourceEvent/NewDataSource.html#/.abstract: The new value of latestData came from a call to Resource.overrideLocalData(...).

Enums/ResourceEvent/NewDataSource.html#/.name: wipe
Enums/ResourceEvent/NewDataSource.html#/.abstract: The resource was wiped, and latestData is now nil.

Enums/ResourceEvent.html#/s:6Siesta13Res.name: observerAdded
Enums/ResourceEvent.html#/s:6Siesta13Res.abstract: Immediately sent to a new observer when it first starts observing a resource. This event allows you to gather

Enums/ResourceEvent.html#/s:6Siesta13Res.name: requested
Enums/ResourceEvent.html#/s:6Siesta13Res.abstract: A load request for this resource started. Resource.isLoading is now true.

Enums/ResourceEvent.html#/s:6Siesta13Res.name: requestCancelled
Enums/ResourceEvent.html#/s:6Siesta13Res.abstract: The request in progress was cancelled before it finished.

Enums/ResourceEvent.html#/s:6Siesta13Res.name: notModified
Enums/ResourceEvent.html#/s:6Siesta13Res.abstract: The request in progress succeeded, but did not result in a change to the resource’s latestData (except

Enums/ResourceEvent.html#/s:6Siesta13Res.name: error
Enums/ResourceEvent.html#/s:6Siesta13Res.abstract: The request in progress failed. Details are in the resource’s latestError property.

Protocols/ResourceObserver.html#/s:6Sies.name: resourceChanged(_:event:)
Protocols/ResourceObserver.html#/s:6Sies.abstract: Called when anything happens that might change the value of the reosurce’s latestData, latestError, or

Protocols/ResourceObserver.html#/s:6Sies.abstract: Receive updates on progress at regular intervals while a request is in progress.

Protocols/ResourceObserver.html#/s:6Sies.name: stoppedObserving(resource:)
Protocols/ResourceObserver.html#/s:6Sies.abstract: Called when this observer stops observing a resource, if the observer itself still exists.

Protocols/ResourceObserver.html#/s:6Sies.name: observerIdentity

Protocols/ResourceObserver.html.name: ResourceObserver
Protocols/ResourceObserver.html.abstract: Something that can observe changes to the state of a Resource.

Enums/ResourceEvent.html.name: ResourceEvent
Enums/ResourceEvent.html.abstract: The possible causes of a call to ResourceObserver.resourceChanged(_:event:).

Protocols/TypedContentAccessors.html#/s:.name: ContentType
Protocols/TypedContentAccessors.html#/s:.abstract: The type of entity content the implementing type provides. Often Any.

Protocols/TypedContentAccessors.html#/s:.abstract: The entity to which the convenience accessors will apply.

Protocols/TypedContentAccessors.html#/s:.abstract: A convenience for retrieving the content in this container when you expect it to be of a specific type.

Protocols/TypedContentAccessors.html#/s:.name: jsonDict
Protocols/TypedContentAccessors.html#/s:.abstract: Returns content if it is a dictionary with string keys; otherwise returns an empty dictionary.

Protocols/TypedContentAccessors.html#/s:.name: jsonArray
Protocols/TypedContentAccessors.html#/s:.abstract: Returns content if it is an array; otherwise returns an empty array.

Protocols/TypedContentAccessors.html#/s:.name: text

Structs/Configuration.html#/s:6Siesta13C.name: progressReportingInterval
Structs/Configuration.html#/s:6Siesta13C.abstract: Interval at which request hooks & observers receive progress updates. This affects how frequently

Structs/Entity.html#/s:6Siesta6EntityV4e.abstract: The etag of this data. If non-nil, Siesta will send an If-None-Match header with subsequent loads.

Structs/Entity.html#/s:6Siesta6EntityV6h.abstract: Returns the value of the HTTP header with the given key. The key is case insensitive.

Structs/Entity.html#/s:6Siesta6EntityV7h.name: headers
Structs/Entity.html#/s:6Siesta6EntityV7h.abstract: All HTTP headers sent with this entity. The keys are in lower case (and will be converted to lowercase if you

Structs/Entity.html#/s:6Siesta6EntityV9t.name: timestamp
Structs/Entity.html#/s:6Siesta6EntityV9t.abstract: The time at which this data was last known to be valid.

Structs/Entity.html#/s:6Siesta6EntityV7c.name: init(content:charset:headers:timestamp:)
Structs/Entity.html#/s:6Siesta6EntityV7c.abstract: Full-width initializer, typically used only for reinflating cached data.

Classes/Resource.html#/s:6Siesta8Resourc.name: latestData

Classes/Resource.html#/s:6Siesta8Resourc.name: latestError
Classes/Resource.html#/s:6Siesta8Resourc.abstract: Details if the last attempt to load this resource resulted in an error. Becomes nil as soon

Classes/Resource.html#/c:@M@Siesta@objc(.name: timestamp
Classes/Resource.html#/c:@M@Siesta@objc(.abstract: The time of the most recent update to either latestData or latestError.

Classes/Resource.html#/c:@M@Siesta@objc(.name: isLoading
Classes/Resource.html#/c:@M@Siesta@objc(.abstract: True if any load requests (i.e. from calls to load(...) and loadIfNeeded())

Classes/Resource.html#/c:@M@Siesta@objc(.name: isRequesting
Classes/Resource.html#/c:@M@Siesta@objc(.abstract: True if any requests for this resource are in progress.

Classes/Resource.html#/s:6Siesta8Resourc.name: loadRequests
Classes/Resource.html#/s:6Siesta8Resourc.abstract: All load requests in progress, in the order they were initiated.

Classes/Resource.html#/s:6Siesta8Resourc.name: allRequests
Classes/Resource.html#/s:6Siesta8Resourc.abstract: All requests in progress related to this resource, in the order they were initiated.

Classes/Resource.html#/s:6Siesta8Resourc.name: RequestMutation

Classes/Resource.html#/c:@M@Siesta@objc(.name: isUpToDate
Classes/Resource.html#/c:@M@Siesta@objc(.abstract: True if the resource’s local state is up to date according to staleness configuration.

Classes/Resource.html#/s:6Siesta8Resourc.name: loadIfNeeded()
Classes/Resource.html#/s:6Siesta8Resourc.abstract: Ensures that there is a load request in progress for this resource, unless the resource is already up to date.

Classes/Resource.html#/s:6Siesta8Resourc.name: load()
Classes/Resource.html#/s:6Siesta8Resourc.abstract: Initiates a GET request to update the state of this resource. This method forces a new request even if there is

Classes/Resource.html#/s:6Siesta8Resourc.name: load(using:)

Classes/Resource.html#/c:@M@Siesta@objc(.name: cancelLoadIfUnobserved(afterDelay:then:)
Classes/Resource.html#/c:@M@Siesta@objc(.abstract: Convenience to call cancelLoadIfUnobserved() after a delay. Useful for situations such as table view scrolling

Classes/Resource.html#/s:6Siesta8Resourc.name: overrideLocalData(with:)
Classes/Resource.html#/s:6Siesta8Resourc.abstract: Directly updates latestData without touching the network. Clears latestError and broadcasts

Classes/Resource.html#/c:@M@Siesta@objc(.name: overrideLocalContent(with:)
Classes/Resource.html#/c:@M@Siesta@objc(.abstract: Convenience method to replace the content of latestData without altering the content type or other headers.

Classes/Resource.html#/c:@M@Siesta@objc(.name: invalidate()
Classes/Resource.html#/c:@M@Siesta@objc(.abstract: Forces the next call to loadIfNeeded() to trigger a request, even if the current content is fresh.

Classes/Resource.html#/c:@M@Siesta@objc(.name: wipe()
Classes/Resource.html#/c:@M@Siesta@objc(.abstract: Resets this resource to its pristine state, as if newly created.

Classes/Resource.html#/s:6Siesta8Resourc.name: configurationPattern(for:)
Classes/Resource.html#/s:6Siesta8Resourc.abstract: Matches this specific resource when passed as a pattern to Service.configure(...).

Classes/Resource.html#/s:6Siesta8Resourc.name: entityForTypedContentAccessors
Classes/Resource.html#/s:6Siesta8Resourc.abstract: Typed content accessors such as .text and .jsonDict apply to latestData?.content.

Classes/Resource.html#/s:6Siesta8Resourc.abstract: Returns a request that immedately fails, without ever touching the network or applying the transformer pipeline.

Classes/Resource.html#/s:6Siesta8Resourc.abstract: Returns a request that immediately and always returns the given response, without ever touching the network

Classes/Resource.html#/s:6Siesta8Resourc.abstract: Creates (but does not start) a new request using custom request logic.

Classes/Resource.html#/s:6Siesta8Resourc.name: request(_:json:contentType:requestMutation:)
Classes/Resource.html#/s:6Siesta8Resourc.abstract: Convenience method to initiate a request with a JSON body.

Classes/Resource.html#/s:6Siesta8Resourc.abstract: Convenience method to initiate a request with URL-encoded parameters in the meesage body.

Classes/Resource.html#/c:@CM@Siesta@objc.abstract: Removes all observers owned by the given object.

Classes/Service.html.abstract: A set of logically connected RESTful resources. Resources within a service share caching, configuration, and a

Classes/Resource.html.name: Resource
